room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: That was awesome! What a super fun and exciting idea for a game. Totally LOVED it! Absolutely worth it...give it a try...you'll be glad you did!!!

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: We had such a wonderful time and can't wait to go again. This is a great activity for families

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: So much fun!!! Staff was very friendly, and offered to accommodate our group of 9 last minute (8 is the usual max), suggesting we do Dorm of the Dead. All of us were escape room "virgins" but we had a great time, even though we didn't quite find the zombie antidote in time! (This is apparently their 2nd most difficult room.) I would definitely go back! It's such a cool concept, and they do a great job making it fun and challenging! They even helped us work through the last couple clues after out time ran out. I highly recommend you get your friends, family, coworkers, whoever together ASAP and try an Epic Escape Game!

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: What a great time! We went for a friends birthday. We did one of the "easier" rooms and it was a blast! The price was fair, the employees were awesome, and the puzzles fun. DO THIS! you will enjoy it!

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: If you're looking for a great way to spend time with your family, you'd be hard pressed to find something better than this. The puzzles are very clever and everyone is completely involved. As you solve one puzzle, you'll find yourself racing to the next, your pace increasing with each success as the clock relentlessly marches to zero. The pressure is intensely fun! Like others, we enjoyed it so much we did it two more times that week! BTW, we tried Puzzah, and Epic is much better. The rooms are tiny at Puzzah.

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: Great Experience.....we will be back to try a more challenging room in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Pikes Peak or Bust: Colorado’s Gold Rush" by Epic Escape Game in Denver
review: One of the most fun yet frustrating nights we've had. We will certainly be back!
